thread.title: TV | The Snapper

author: Fiona Flynn
title: TV | The Snapper
text: Your bank holiday weekend is complete, The Snapper is on! Hard to explain how much as a nation we love this movie, although don't think anyone outside of Ireland would even understand it. It tells the story of 'Sharton' who gets up the duff, and not by a Spanish bleedin' sailer like she says, it's actually Georgey bleedin' Burges so it is. And it's really just A1 stuff altogether. Sharon is played by Tina Kelleher, while her da, who is just gas beyond words, is played by the lovely Colm Meaney. If you're staying in tonight, stick this on the bl dddin telly, will ya?
